todos.text: persist data Using Json Sever and run server and React app  with Npm start
Server Side Todo List Using Next.js Or Nuxt.js
Change the list of items so that you do not have too many items in the list.
For mange Todo List Using Context Or Redux
Filter changes should be applied to the url and the url filter should be updated as well.
The two buttons All and Active apply a filter to the list and delete it. Normally, all items are displayed, and by pressing the Active button, only the list of unfinished to do is displayed.
To finish any item as desired, either use the checkbox and place it on the left side of each item or click on each item to do this.
Click the Delete button to remove any item from the list
By adding each item, a new item is added to the bottom of our to do list
Do not use a specific library for styles and use only css, sass or...
